name: 'Bonnie and Clyde' - The Movie Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Faye Dunaway.

	Jane Fonda was offered the role but turned it down because she was living in Paris at the time and did not want to move back to the U.S.

questions.text: What happened at the first bank they robbed?
options: They got laughed at by the customers
questions.explanation:
They got nothing.

	They get nothing because the bank failed 3 weeks earlier and Clyde makes the banker go out to the car and explain to Bonnie why he didn't get any money from the bank.

questions.text: What foolish thing does their getaway car driver do during a bank robbery?
questions.explanation:
Parks in a tight spot.

	He parallel parks and when Bonnie and Clyde come out they have trouble getting out of the parking spot.

questions.text: What is the name of the Texas Ranger that the Barrow gang take their picture with?
questions.explanation:
Frank Hamer.

	Played by Denver Pyle.

questions.text: Which of the following won an Academy Award for 'Bonnie and Clyde'?
questions.explanation:
Estelle Parsons.

	Even though all 4 were nominated, only Estelle Parsons won. She won for Best Supporting Actress. Most people know her today as Roseanne's Mother on Roseanne.

questions.text: In which city did Clyde meet Bonnie?
questions.explanation:
Dallas, Texas.

	They meet in West Dallas.

questions.text: When Clyde meets Bonnie, he tells Bonnie he just got out of prison. What was he in prison for?
Who played Eugene Grizzard, the guy who was kidnapped along with his girlfriend by the Barrow gang?
questions.explanation:
Gene Wilder.

	It was one of Gene Wilder's earliest movies.
